name: Chrystal Wilson
text: Should give them zero stars. Ordered a pizza and when I get there they donâ€™t have my order and I was on a 30 min lunch break and she looks at me and ask if I call her store. When I called I even asked if this as Archdale store. Will never eat there again

name: James Dobson
text: Ordered two personal pans. They got it wrong,  they remade it and got it wrong as well. After  45 minutes and 4 wrong pizzas I was offered to come be another time and get a free one. Why would I,  they had 2 chances today. Sadly I will not go back there and would tell everyone not to.

name: Sara Hubbard
text: Really good..but ask for light sauce or that's all you'll takes (traditional hand tossed)

name: Jason Russell
text: Pizza was God awful. I ordered and waited for the pizza in the store. When it came out it was already cold, how does that happen? Pizza hut used to be so good back in the 90s before everything was frozen BS. No wonder so many locations across the US are closing down.

name: Kevin Clewis
text: My wife ordered a pizza at 8pm, website said it would be a 30 minute wait. After an hour, had my wife call back and they told her it just came out oven and headed out with 1 stop in front of me. Another 30 minutes later I call and they tell â€¦More

name: Mark Badgett
text: This Pizza Hut has some odd policies.I was charged a $5 dollar delivery fee. This isnt unusual.What is wrong with this is that I wasnt advised that with a minimum order delivery is free.ONLY 1.00 + change.I could have gotten wings with  no â€¦More

text: Pizza hut is my all time favorite but this particular location does not believe in washing their hands!  I've watched a young man who just finished using the restroom and did not wash his hands and so on and so on . I'm disgusted

text: Paid $26 for 5 p-zones and no pepperoni one 3 manager said she made but couldn't answer why they weren't made properly. We will NEVER go back or RECOMMEND then to anyone go to sir pizza for better food and service!!!!

text: very very disappointed! i ordered my food at 8:30pm and didnt get it delivered until 10:45pm, food was cold and the driver was very rude! will not be ordering from here again! will spend my money elsewhere.

text: My husband and I ordered two pepperoni pizzas this afternoon to take home from Pizza Hut' s  $5.00 menu. The lady who waited on us was very helpful and friendly. Our pizzas were ready before the specified time. And our pizzas were also â€¦More

text: Excellent service, delivery. Pizza there has always been good. I wished they would use yellow onions like the good old days, best pizza in town, I get thin crust.

text: Would be zero stars if I could. I placed my order at 6:49pm  Received my food at 9:35pm... food was cold when I called and all they said was they could give me  4.00 off my order that I already paid for... will not be ordering from here again!

text: The garlic cheese knots were good. Obviously the guy who took my order didn't pay attention to what I said I wanted so I left with 8 less wings. The guy got very loud with me and I don't appreciate it. The pizza was very disappointing the â€¦More

text: Worst ever. The wings were cold. They weren't even fried. Pizza was cold. Suppose to had a credit and call and it wasn't in the system. Dont go there!!!

name: Nota Fuqboi
text: Incredibly slow service on a Saturday night.  I ordered on the app, but when I got there was told that they were out of the crust I requested. I proceeded to wait for another 45 minutes for them to make the 2 replacement pizzas. I will not go here again.
